column6: When a NORAD base full of Super-Skrulls captures the Merc with a Mouth, he'll need every ability he possesses to get free: his fighting skills, his healing factor, his sense of humor and, most of all, his madness! See Deadpool create and train an army of Deadpool-Skrulls! And behind the whole thing, could it be...Nick Fury?!
column8: | penciller:Clayton Crain | penciller:Paco Medina | other:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Marte Gracia | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Juan Vlasco | writer:Daniel Way
